atk-s0517a10:2_1: Idāni tesaṁ tiṇṇaṁ vipallāsānaṁ pahānakaraṁ ariyamaggaṁ dassentena kathitāya maggakathāya apubbatthānuvaṇṇanā.
atk-s0517a10:2_2: Tattha maggoti kenaṭṭhena maggoti yo buddhasāsane maggoti vuccati, so kenaṭṭhena maggo nāma hotīti attho.
atk-s0517a10:2_3: Micchādiṭṭhiyā pahānāyātiādīsu dasasu pariyāyesu paṭhamo paṭhamo tassa tassa maggaṅgassa ujuvipaccanīkavasena vutto.
atk-s0517a10:2_4: Maggo ceva hetu cāti tassa tassa kiccassa karaṇāya paṭipadaṭṭhena maggo, sampāpakaṭṭhena hetu.
atk-s0517a10:2_5: Tena maggassa paṭipadaṭṭho sampāpakaṭṭho ca vutto hoti.
atk-s0517a10:2_7: 5.5, 48) hi paṭipadā maggo, ‘‘maggassa niyyānaṭṭho hetuṭṭho’’tiādīsu (paṭi. ma. 2.8) sampāpako hetu.
atk-s0517a10:2_8: Evaṁ dvīhi dvīhi padehi ‘‘maggoti kenaṭṭhena maggo’’ti pucchāya vissajjanaṁ kataṁ hoti.
atk-s0517a10:2_9: Sahajātānaṁ dhammānaṁ upatthambhanāyāti attanā sahajātānaṁ arūpadhammānaṁ sahajātaaññamaññanissayādibhāvena upatthambhanabhāvāya.
atk-s0517a10:2_11: Paṭivedhādivisodhanāyāti ettha yasmā ‘‘ko cādi kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ, sīlañca suvisuddhaṁ diṭṭhi ca ujukā’’ti (saṁ. ni.
atk-s0517a10:2_12: 5.369, 381) vacanato sīlañca diṭṭhi ca saccapaṭivedhassa ādi.
atk-s0517a10:2_19: Saccābhisamayāyāti catunnaṁ saccānaṁ ekābhisamayāya kiccanipphattivasena ekapaṭivedhāya.
atk-s0517a10:2_20: Nirodhe patiṭṭhāpanāyāti cittassa vā puggalassa vā nibbāne patiṭṭhāpanatthāya.
atk-s0517a10:2_21: Sakadāgāmimaggakkhaṇādīsu aṭṭha maggaṅgāni ekato katvā taṁtaṁmaggavajjhakilesappahānaṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-s0517a10:2_23: Yasmā uparūparimaggenāpi suṭṭhu ādivisodhanā suṭṭhu cittavodānañca hoti, tasmā tānipi padāni vuttāni.
atk-s0517a10:3_0: Dassanamaggotiādīhi yāva pariyosānā tassa dhammassa lakkhaṇavasena maggaṭṭho vutto.
atk-s0517a10:3_3: Hetuṭṭhena maggoti ca aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo niddiṭṭho.
atk-s0517a10:3_5: Ādhipateyyaṭṭhena indriyāti ādīni ca indriyādīnaṁ atthavasena vuttāni, na maggaṭṭhavasena. Saccānīti cettha saccañāṇāni.
atk-s0517a10:3_6: Sabbepi te dhammā nibbānassa paṭipadaṭṭhena maggo.
atk-s0517a10:3_7: Ante vuttaṁ nibbānaṁ pana saṁsāradukkhābhibhūtehi dukkhanissaraṇatthikehi sappurisehi maggīyati gavesīyatīti maggoti vuttanti veditabbanti.
